column5: Smart A$$ ..Why not post it or DON'T post at all !!!!Here you go Hammerhead Herb...White Wing contact #'s http://www.whitewingresort.com/index2.htmlPhone: 1-807-222-3000 OrUS toll-free at 1-800-265-1764

I didn't post the number because I looked it up on goggle it took about 1 minute. If the Hammerhead really wanted the number he could have looked it up. He was smart enought to get on this website and ask the question? I'm surprized he didn't ask for hours of operation and prices. I don't mind passing along info but if it's readily available I try and figure it out myself.

So, If you had no information to give .THEN, WHY POST AT ALL ..Yes, it readily available and anyone kind find it, if they look for it .I found it easily enough.. And had no problem answering a simple question with a simple answer .It is called courtesy ... Try it !!!!!
watch yourself there NW walleye i would n't wnat you to have a stroke over this.

You have me figured out do you ? Thinking that I am old fella .. No stroke here..Just thought that I would let you in on a secret ... Web forums to me = open discussion, useful information, sharing of experiences and knowledge .. It's over ....
Is D&S still selling bait to individual fishermen? I used them a couple of years ago, satisfied with the count and they were quite reasonable in their prices.
try pine tree bait at evergreen lodge.
We have been using Four Seasons in Ear Falls for years and are very satisfied.
depends if you want to buy in bulk or not. 4 seasons sells by the dozen,pine tree will sell both ways.
does pine tree have leeches also?
yes they have leeches at a very good price. they have all kinds of bait at some of the best prices in the area.
Four Seasons sells bulk as well as by the doz..
I like getting minnows from Whitewing. The count was far more generous than most I have run accross in the area. They also can pack them in HUGE oxygen packed bags for longer transport.
I take it then that D&S is not around anymore. Is there a contact number for Whitewing?
